Room.Name: Poor Alley
Room.ShortDescription: You are in Poor alley, jostling with beggers and elderly people.
Room.LongDescription: There is a chapter of the Begger's Guild on the west side of this disgusting throughfare, and an open door on the east side is a Conjurer's Guild. The beggers coming out of the guild seems to be mostly maimed and blind, but some get around amazingly well in spite of their apparent handicap. A very strong and unpleasant odor wafts on the breeze.
